resources.string: An app to help victims endure bullying.
If you are feeling helpless due to bullying and are thinking about suicide:\n\n * Click here to call the National Suicide Prevention Lifeline @ 1-800-273-TALK (8255).
*Click here to email a professional who can help.

If someone is bullying you:

* Try to stay calm.

* Keep yourself surrounded by people - a crowd can draw the bully away.
* Tell someone you trust - a friend, family member or teacher perhaps.\n\n* Dont give in to anger and become the bully yourself.

Someone is acting differently than normal, such as always seeming sad or anxious, struggling to complete tasks, or not being able care for themselves.:\n* Talk to them and see what you can do to help.

* Be a good listener.

* Talk to their parents.

* Call a local counselor or mental health professional.
